Interface FlipFitAdminDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitAdminDAO
public interface FlipFitAdminDAOInterface
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for handling administrative tasks in FlipFit system. This interface defines methods related to gym owners and gym centers approval/validation.
Author:
gamma-group

  • Method Details

    • getPendingGymOwners

      List<FlipFitGymOwner> getPendingGymOwners()
      Retrieves a list of pending gym owners awaiting approval.
      Returns:
      List of pending gym owners

    • validateGymOwner

      void validateGymOwner(String gymOwnerId, boolean isApproved)
      Validates (approves or rejects) a gym owner based on the given ID.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - ID of the gym owner to validate
      isApproved - True to approve, false to reject

    • validateGymCentre

      void validateGymCentre(String gymCentreId, boolean isApproved)
      Validates (approves or rejects) a gym center based on the given ID.
      Parameters:
      gymCentreId - ID of the gym center to validate
      isApproved - True to approve, false to reject

    • getPendingGymCentres

      List<FlipFitGymCenter> getPendingGymCentres()
      Retrieves a list of pending gym centers awaiting approval.
      Returns:
      List of pending gym centers

    • registerAdmin

      void registerAdmin(String userName, String password, String email)
      Registers a new admin.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username of the admin
      password - Password of the admin
      email - Email of the admin

    • isUserValid

      boolean isUserValid(String userName, String password)
      Validates if an admin user is valid.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username of the admin
      password - Password of the admin
      Returns:
      True if valid, false otherwise
